summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and related forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 31, 2019. It records inmate counts, out-counts, and an inmate roster, including an entry for inmate 'WEBER' (Reg No. 85377-054) assigned to the hospital (HOSP). The documents are official prison administrative records from the date Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

persons.name: Weber
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 85377-054, assigned to the hospital (HOSP) category on July 31, 2019.

events.title: Daily Prison Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, recording a total of 763 inmates with a verification count of 762.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 31, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
It is an official Bureau of Prisons count sheet, showing routine administrative operations at the MCC.
An inmate named 'WEBER' (Reg No. 85377-054) is listed on the inmate roster as being assigned to the hospital (HOSP) on that date.
The total inmate count recorded was 763, with a verification count of 762.
The document includes multiple 'Official Count Slip' forms, all blank, indicating standard count procedures were followed.
